title: Costa Rican Apologizes After Nearly Derailing CX King Van der Poel: ‘He Should Have Shoved Me Even Harder’
content:
MVDP urges popular cyclocross rider not to quit after high-profile incident in Gavere World Cup: 'He should not give up on his dream.'

Read the full article at Costa Rican Apologizes After Nearly Derailing CX King Van der Poel: ‘He Should Have Shoved Me Even Harder’ on Velo.
author: ahood
